Text: Thanks for another build has quicktime browser stopped working again ?

Finally, a new one. I hope this is bug-free. Anyway i can play the radio (it's a big thing for me). Thanks for a great build.
It's realy cool. Hey, i can see the speed in "my files" if i transfer frome FTP>Xbox. Cool! The It's seams to shoutcast's works..

n1ce. dlling...
you the man gasgiver!

went back to the 4th september release.

all the bugs before were fixed but now the xbmc doesn't rewind videos burnt on a dvd when playing, they even jump forward. 
videos played from the hdd wind back very slowly only.
the apple trailers don't work anymore although I'm using the same script as before.

radio works, led stuff is fixed, too.

the apple trailers say: list index out of range.
anybody know how to fix this? 

waiting for the next release.

found another bug in the current release: my evoxdash doesn't load when I do a reboot out of xbmc.
tried several times.

the release from the 4th september loads the dash.
Go complain to the makers of XBMC then. Not gasgivers fault they keep breaking stuff =P
"all the bugs before were fixed but now the xbmc doesn't rewind videos burnt on a dvd when playing, they even jump forward. " Change the cach-size?
I never changed anything in the cache settings. I'll play around. =)
